projects.name: X-Blade
projects.subtitle: Cross obstacles and save Julia
projects.longDescription:
Once upon a time, there were two friends, John and Julia. One day they were going for a walk. In the middle of the walk, Julia saw a flower and wanted it. So John plucked it and gave it to Julia. That flower was a mysterious flower and made Julia disappear.

Now help John and his friends to find Julia.
